newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy confidence vote set for Tuesday at 1200 GMT.
newsitem.headline: Italy confidence vote set for Tuesday at 1200 GMT.

text.p: A confidence vote called by the Italian government on a batch of measures included in its 1997 budget will be held on Tuesday at 1200 GMT, parliamentary party leaders said.
The government called the confidence motion on Monday to sweep away opposition amendments and ram the decree into law.

The session will start at 0900 GMT and voting will begin at 1200 GMT. The result of the motion, in which the government is not expected to face serious difficulties, will be known some two hours later.
